name: Fight the clone cowboys
description:
This game is made for the ScoreSpace Jam #16 with the theme: "Clones". It is recommended to not play fullscreen.

The cowboy clones have spiraled out of control! Help the sheriff to stop them and to save to world!

Controls:

-WASD or arrowkeys to move. Left click to shoot.

Credits: 

-Font used: https://www.1001fonts.com/quentincaps-font.html

-Sheriff star image : https://webstockreview.net/pict/getfirst

- Background music: https://pixabay.com/music/traditional-country-running-fiddlers-country-band-7742...

-Sound: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/male-screams-1-6080/

Team:

-crazykelpi
